author: vinceconnare

comments.content: Why do I feel this urge to use Papyrus all of a sudden?

forgot to say this was Maz shot by me at St. Brides Library in one of the back rooms. It is a great setting for librarians. And a large donation was made to Maz and St. Brides library by me but not as large as the Peter Saville photoshoot budget which should have gone to St. Brides instead. Commercial twits...

What would be the first-time sex Issues ever will come accross?  
 [London Escorts](http://web.archive.org/web/20090918103754/http:/www.24carat-escorts.com/)
Speaking of spankings, how long is this tart card thing going to be flogged? The book came out ages ago.

john said:  
\> how long is this tart card thing going to be flogged?

i think i would like to see that picture above pop up  
on my radar-screen about once every 2-3 months...

any more often than that might be excessive. (might.)

-bowerbird
